name: Unmarked Quest Objectives: Treatment for Fallout 3
tagline: This is a plugin for Fallout 3 which adds quest objectives and map markers to one of the game's unmarked quests, "Treatment", so you can now track your progress on this quest with your Pip-Boy! Copyright (c) 2014 Skamagkis Stavros.
body:
###Description
This plugin adds quest objectives and map markers to one of the game's unmarked quests, "Treatment",
so you can now track your progress on this quest with your Pip-Boy!

For more information on the "Treatment" quest, please refer to 
ï»¿http://fallout.wikia.com/wiki/Treatment


###Install
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\Fallout 3\Data\
4. Start Fallout 3 Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

###Uninstall
1. Start Fallout 3 Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the .esp plugin associated with the mod.


###History
2.0, 2014/08/31:
Added a quest objective according to a rumor heard from a resident regarding Megaton's water purifier.

1.0, 2014/08/25 - Initial release:
Generates and synchronizes quest objectives according to the player's progress on the "Treatment" quest.
